column2:
Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table: 

|        |       1    |    2    |    3     |    4    |    5    |
| job |         |         |         |         |         |
| city  |         |         |         |         |         |
| music-genre |         |         |         |         |         |
| house  |         |         |         |         |         |
| hobby  |         |         |         |         |          

Puzzle: 
 
City: venice, hamburg, colone, new-york, liverpool
The people have 5 different jobs:  manager, journalist, analyst, police-officer, engineer
House: modern, palace, wooden, colonial, gothic-revival
The people prefer 5 different music-genres: rock, salsa, funk, dubstep, pop
The people have 5 different hobbies: writing, drawing, puzzles, chess, collecting

1. the manager is the person traveling to venice
2. the journalist is the person who's hobby is writing
3. the fan of rock is the person traveling to hamburg
4. the analyst is the fan of salsa
5. the person traveling to hamburg is to the right of the person traveling to colone
6. the modern house is the person who's hobby is collecting
7. the palace house is the person traveling to new-york
8. the fan of funk is in the middle
9. the police-officer is on the far left
10. the wooden house is on the left or right of the person who's hobby is drawing
11. the palace house is to the left or right of the person who's hobby is chess
12. the colonial house is the fan of dubstep
13. the engineer is the gothic-revival house
14. the police-officer is to the left or right of the person traveling to liverpool. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.

Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table:

Puzzle: 
 
There are 5 different favourite colors: red, green, ivory, yellow, blue
There are 5 different nationalities: english, spanish, ukranian, norwegian, japanese
5 different brands of cigars are smoked: old-gold, kools, chesterfields, lucky-strike, parliaments
There are 5 different favourite beverages: coffee, tea, milk, orange-juice, water
The people perfer 5 different movie-genres: romance, animation, mystery, horror, spy

1. the english is the person who likes red
2. the spanish is the person watching romance movies
3. the person drinking coffee is the person who likes green
4. the ukranian is the person drinking tea
5. the person who likes green is to the right of the person who likes ivory
6. the old-gold-smoker is the person watching spy movies
7. the kools-smoker is the person who likes yellow
8. the person drinking milk is in the middle
9. the norwegian is on the far left
10. the chesterfields-smoker is on the left or right of the person watching animation movies
11. the kools-smoker is to the left or right of the person watching horror movies
12. the lucky-strike-smoker is the person drinking orange-juice
13. the japanese is the parliaments-smoker
14. the norwegian is to the left or right of the person who likes blue. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.

Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table:

Puzzle: 
 
There are 5 different favourite colors: red, green, ivory, yellow, blue
There 5 different types of food: cranberry, potato, banana, tomato, carrot
5 different brands of cigars are smoked: old-gold, kools, chesterfields, lucky-strike, parliaments
The people have 5 different hobbies: collecting, board-games, photography, skydiving, woodworking
5 different pets are kept: dog, fox, zebra, horse, snails

1. the person eating cranberry is the person who likes red
2. the person eating potato is the owner of the dog
3. the person who's hobby is collecting is the person who likes green
4. the person eating banana is the person who's hobby is board-games
5. the person who likes green is to the right of the person who likes ivory
6. the old-gold-smoker is the owner of the snails
7. the kools-smoker is the person who likes yellow
8. the person who's hobby is photography is in the middle
9. the person eating tomato is on the far left
10. the chesterfields-smoker is on the left or right of the owner of the fox
11. the kools-smoker is to the left or right of the owner of the horse
12. the lucky-strike-smoker is the person who's hobby is skydiving
13. the person eating carrot is the parliaments-smoker
14. the person eating tomato is to the left or right of the person who likes blue. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.

Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table:

Puzzle: 
 
The people prefer 5 different types of sport: cycling, ice-hockey, basketball, baseball, surfing
There are 5 different nationalities: english, spanish, ukranian, norwegian, japanese
5 different brands of cigars are smoked: old-gold, kools, chesterfields, lucky-strike, parliaments
The people's birthday is in 5 different months: march, december, may, september, august
5 different games are played: poker, billiard, backgammon, domino, snooker

1. the english is the person who's sport is cycling
2. the spanish is the person playing poker
3. the person who's birthday is in march is the person who's sport is ice-hockey
4. the ukranian is the person who's birthday is in december
5. the person who's sport is ice-hockey is to the right of the person who's sport is basketball
6. the old-gold-smoker is the person playing snooker
7. the kools-smoker is the person who's sport is baseball
8. the person who's birthday is in may is in the middle
9. the norwegian is on the far left
10. the chesterfields-smoker is on the left or right of the person playing billiard
11. the kools-smoker is to the left or right of the person playing domino
12. the lucky-strike-smoker is the person who's birthday is in september
13. the japanese is the parliaments-smoker
14. the norwegian is to the left or right of the person who's sport is surfing. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.

Puzzle: 
 
The people grow 5 different varities of flowers: aconite, iris, rose, daffodil, begonia
The people prefer 5 different music-genres: r&b, dubstep, punk, pop, house
The people perfer 5 different movie-genres: musical, western, sports, fantasy, horror
There are 5 different favourite beverages: coffee, tea, milk, orange-juice, water
The people's birthday is in 5 different months: september, april, february, august, july

1. the fan of r&b is the person who grows aconite
2. the fan of dubstep is the person who's birthday is in september
3. the person drinking coffee is the person who grows iris
4. the fan of punk is the person drinking tea
5. the person who grows iris is to the right of the person who grows rose
6. the person watching musical movies is the person who's birthday is in july
7. the person watching western movies is the person who grows daffodil
8. the person drinking milk is in the middle
9. the fan of pop is on the far left
10. the person watching sports movies is on the left or right of the person who's birthday is in april
11. the person watching western movies is to the left or right of the person who's birthday is in august
12. the person watching fantasy movies is the person drinking orange-juice
13. the fan of house is the person watching horror movies
14. the fan of pop is to the left or right of the person who grows begonia. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.
